statements: SELECT * FROM backdrops;
SELECT backdrop_name, backdrop_type FROM backdrops WHERE location = 'Outdoor';
SELECT backdrop_id, backdrop_name FROM backdrops ORDER BY backdrop_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM backdrops WHERE backdrop_name LIKE '%Nature%';
SELECT * FROM backdrops WHERE backdrop_type = 'Scenic' AND location = 'Mountain';
SELECT * FROM backdrops WHERE backdrop_type = 'Outdoor'
SELECT backdrop_name, location FROM backdrops WHERE backdrop_id = 5
SELECT backdrop_type, COUNT(*) AS total_backdrops FROM backdrops GROUP BY backdrop_type
SELECT * FROM backdrops ORDER BY backdrop_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT backdrop_type FROM backdrops
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE photographer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT photo_id, photo_name FROM photos WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_type = 'City';
SELECT photo_name, photographer_name FROM photos WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY photo_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location_type FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(photo_id) AS total_photos FROM locations JOIN photos ON locations.location_id = photos.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_photos > 2;
SELECT * FROM backdrops;
SELECT backdrop_name, location_type FROM backdrops WHERE backdrop_id = 1;
SELECT cityscape_name, location_id FROM cityscapes WHERE cityscape_id = 3;
SELECT landscape_name FROM landscapes WHERE location_id = 4 ORDER BY landscape_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM backdrops WHERE location_type = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY backdrop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM backdrops WHERE location_type = 'Forest';
SELECT landscape_name FROM landscapes WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY landscape_name DESC;
SELECT cityscape_name, backdrop_name FROM cityscapes INNER JOIN backdrops ON cityscapes.location_id = backdrops.backdrop_id WHERE cityscape_id > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT cityscape_name FROM cityscapes WHERE location_id IN (SELECT backdrop_id FROM backdrops WHERE location_type = 'Mountain');
SELECT * FROM backdrops INNER JOIN landscapes ON backdrops.backdrop_id = landscapes.location_id WHERE backdrop_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY landscape_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Landscapes;
SELECT landscape_name, location FROM Landscapes WHERE photographer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Cityscapes ORDER BY cityscape_name DESC;
SELECT cityscape_name, location FROM Cityscapes WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT photo_title, c.cityscape_name, l.landscape_name FROM Photos p LEFT JOIN Cityscapes c ON p.cityscape_id = c.cityscape_id LEFT JOIN Landscapes l ON p.landscape_id = l.landscape_id;
SELECT * FROM Landscapes;
SELECT landscape_name, location FROM Landscapes WHERE photographer_id = 1;
SELECT landscape_id, location FROM Landscapes WHERE landscape_name LIKE 'Mountain%';
SELECT * FROM Photos WHERE cityscape_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY photo_id DESC;
SELECT studio_name, photographer_id FROM IndoorStudioSetups WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY photographer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Landscapes;
SELECT city_name, city_population FROM Cityscapes;
SELECT studio_name AS 'Studio Name', studio_location AS 'Location', studio_capacity AS 'Capacity' FROM Studios;
SELECT photo_name, photo_description, photographer_id FROM Photos WHERE photo_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_type FROM PhotoLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Studios WHERE studio_capacity > 50;
SELECT studio_name, studio_location FROM Studios WHERE studio_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT city_name, city_population FROM Cityscapes ORDER BY city_population DESC;
SELECT photo_name, photo_description, photographer_id FROM Photos WHERE photographer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Landscapes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
